member.name: T:Program
member.summary: Main program class for testing vector addition.

member.name: M:Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: The main entry point for the application.

member.name: M:Program.PrintVector(System.Double[])
member.summary: Prints a vector to the console in a readable format.

member.name: M:VectorMath.Add(System.Double[],System.Double[])
member.param: The first vector to add. Must be 2D or 3D.
The second vector to add. Must be 2D or 3D.
member.returns: The resulting vector from adding vector1 and vector2. Returns a vector containing -1 if the vectors are invalid or incompatible.
